name: MeningitisDisordersICD10CM
title: Meningitis (Disorders) (ICD10CM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has Meningitis regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: Meningitis, unspecified cause),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
